revised_title: Relativistic Analysis of Shock Waves in an Ultra-Relativistic Fluid
tldr: The authors analyze the motion of plane shock waves in an ultra-relativistic fluid using the special theory of relativity. They derive equations for the properties of normal and oblique shock waves and demonstrate that the equation of state for an ultra-relativistic gas makes the problem determinate. The study focuses on an ultra-relativistic gas, such as pure radiation, and avoids questions of relativistic thermodynamics and statistical mechanics.
